name: preflight-vsts-extension
description: Run your tests after the release to your environment.
author: PreFlight

inputs.name: clientId
inputs.label: Client ID
inputs.helpMarkDown: Your Client ID. You can create one from your account settings.(Account Settings -> Api Settings)

inputs.name: clientSecret
inputs.label: Client Secret
inputs.helpMarkDown: Your Client Secret. You can create one from your account settings.(Account Settings -> Api Settings)

inputs.name: groupid
inputs.label: Group ID
inputs.helpMarkDown: Pass the Group Id to run. If it's not passed all the tests will be run.

inputs.name: environmentid
inputs.label: Environment ID
inputs.helpMarkDown: Environment ID for your test group.

inputs.name: capturescreenshots
inputs.label: Capture Screenshots
inputs.helpMarkDown: Capture screenshots while running tests. Default is false.

inputs.name: platforms
inputs.label: Platforms
inputs.helpMarkDown: Platforms to run. The test will run on Windows Chrome. Example format : {'platform': 'windows','browser': 'chrome'}, {'platform': 'mac','browser': 'safari'}
